data.name: Bang Bang Slice
data.description:
Shoot and slice your way through enemies across unique levels and scenarios in this homage to 80's action movies. The only way to move is to defeat an enemy and grab their weapon out of mid air, taking their place: Strategy is just as important as reflexes, so moving through enemies in a correct order will prevent you from being stranded.

Features 40+ unique weapons including blades, grenades, pistols, SMGs and shotguns.

There are currently 40 levels and counting, each presenting a unique combat scenario with different sets of goals. Some require you to assassinate a VIP, in others youll need to escape the room. Most levels have multiple different paths to victory, and enemies use randomized weapons so each playthrough will present a new challenge. Each level is designed to be difficult while you learn enemy patterns and positions, so keep playing to hone your skills and improve your score.

changelog.change_log: Adds a new level Tower, a tribute to one of my favorite episodes of Samurai Jack.  The Level Select menu now has buttons to sort the levels by number, completion status, difficulty and length.  A few bug fixes, some SFX improvements, model improvements and 2 new achievements.

Adds a new level Gunship, along with two new heavy weapons.  Youll need to take down an attack helicopter while moving through a warzone.  4 new achievements added.  You can now "Perfect" levels by taking zero damage and getting 100% accuracy or better: this is indicated by a star instead of a checkmark on the level select menu.
Adding small haptics and sfx when grabbing weapons.  Adding 2 new achievements.  Fixing Silent Assassin achievement being granted always.
Adding tutorial for bullet curving, knives stuck to your head can now be pulled out and used
Bug fix for tutorial level, two new mutators

New Mutators (Mods) added: Ricochet bullets, exploding armor and 1-hit-kill enemies add mayhem to the mix. 1-hit-kill player and No Aim Assist let you bump up the difficulty at your own pace. New Level "Carnival" lets you take a break from the action and enjoy some mini games. Quality of life improvements: Thumbsticks can now scroll through the level select menu and Height offset lets you set your height in 10cm increments to support seated mode.
Adding 2 new levels.  Adding Mod System that alters gameplay in a variety of ways.  Fixing incorrect Level conditions showing on some levels.
